segments.text: I observe the woman at the sink, her back partially turned.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate, wiping it meticulously with the towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is on, and water is cascading over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the counter and floor, creating a slippery hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle already, she could slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy's on that stool, stretching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting back, he looks like he's about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he drops, those cookies will scatter, and he might get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, arm up, eyes on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're both in on this sneaky cookie grab.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets and window make the whole scene feel exposed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens in this domestic disaster waiting to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
